dc_title_s: The kingdoms of Spain and Portugal : compiled & reduced from numerous topographic surveys, the maritime surveys of Don Vicente Tofino, &c.
dc_description_s: London, Published 1st January 1823, by Richard H. Laurie, No. 53, Fleet Street.; Relief shown by hachures.; Three scale bars: British statute miles -- Spanish leagues -- Portugese leagues.|60 x 78 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:1,600,000|General Map Collection
